LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Queue_Text_Motes_De: When enabled, text motes will be queued and released over time to keep them from overlapping as much.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Attach_Callout_Text: When enabled, callout text hovers above the caller's head instead of flying out.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wound_Level_De: Wounds of the select severity and worse will generate text motes.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_All_Des: Create text alerts for all injuries
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_Serious: Create text alerts for serious injuries or worse
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_Major_D: Create text alerts for major injuries or worse
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_Destroy: Create text alerts only for destroyed parts
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_None_De: Disable text alerts for injured parts
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Draw_Label_Backgrou: Draw label background for text motes
When enabled, text motes will be drawn on a light grey background.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Base_Callout_Chance: Base chance that a callout will be occur on a related event.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Callout_When_Target: When enabled, humanlikes will callout when targeting animals.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Animal_Callouts_Des: When enabled, animals can call out.
